## About me

Welcome to my website! My name is Rachel Alvarado and I am a recent Environmental Studies graduate from UC Santa Barbara. I am interested in habitat conservation, environmental consulting, and green building. This webpage showcases my studies, experience, and extracurriculars. This website is continuously updated to encompass my increasing accomplishments and interests.\
